item.description:
Foxwoods Casino is showcasing the Titanic Exhibit allowing spectators to marvel in this grand shipâ€™s history dating back to 1912. The exhibit offers an audio tour along with actual Titanic artifacts that will make us feel as if we are walking the decks of this marvelous vessel.

Join us for a day of exploration, rediscovery and awe as we take a step back in time.

For those interested, Foxwoods offers plenty of restaurants to choose from for lunch.


Visit the Foxwoods website for ticket information.
http://www.foxwoods.c...

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: Foxwoods: Titanic Exhibit
